con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Services TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Report to Generate" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="soapui-setings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:interface.name: FindMyApp
con:interface.con:description: REST API for FindMyApp - UKA-11 student festival

con:method.name: get
con:method.con:description: Check availability of the server

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:method.name: getFeaturedApp
con:method.con:description: Get the featured app

con:parameter.con:name: marketID
con:parameter.con:description: id of app

con:method.name: get
con:method.con:description: Show a list of apps

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Show apps numbered greater than this

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Don't show apps numbered greater than this

con:method.name: getLatestApps
con:method.con:description: Get the latest apps

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Don't show apps newer than this

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Don't show apps older than this

con:method.name: getMostPopularApps
con:method.con:description: Get apps sorted on popularity

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: List apps starting from this number

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: List apps not greater than this number

con:method.name: getAppOfTheDay
con:method.con:description: Get the app of the day

con:parameter.con:name: appId
con:parameter.con:description: id of app

con:method.name: getDetailedAppInfoFromId
con:method.con:description: Get detailed information about the specified app

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: Id of location

con:method.name: getRandomFact
con:method.con:description: Get a randomly chosen fact of a location

con:method.name: getFacts
con:method.con:description: Get facts about a location

con:method.name: getLatestHumidity
con:method.con:description: Get latest humidity data from a location

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Number of samples to show

con:method.name: getHumidityData
con:method.con:description: Get humidity data from a location

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Only show samples newer than this value

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Only show samples older than this

con:method.name: postHumidityData
con:method.con:description: Post humidity data. Secured, only for sensors

con:method.name: getLatestNoise
con:method.con:description: Get latest noise from a location

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Number of samples to show

con:method.name: getNoiseData
con:method.con:description: Get noise data from a location

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Only show samples newer than this

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Only show samples older than this

con:method.name: postNoiseData
con:method.con:description: Post noise data. Secured, only for sensors

con:method.name: getLatestTemperature
con:method.con:description: get latest temperature from a location

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Number of samples to show

con:method.name: getTemperatureData
con:method.con:description: Get temperature data from a location

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Only show temperatures registered after this time

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Only show temperatures registered before this time

con:method.name: postTemperatureData
con:method.con:description: Post Temperature. Secured, only for sensors

con:method.name: CountForSpesificLocation
con:method.con:description: Count the number of users registered at the given location

con:method.name: getUsersAtLocation
con:method.con:description: Get users registered at this position

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:method.name: getLatestBeers
con:method.con:description: Get latest beer tap data from a location

con:parameter.con:name: tapId
con:parameter.con:description: Id of tap

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Nuber of samples to show

con:method.name: getBeerTapData
con:method.con:description: Get beer tap data from a location

con:parameter.con:name: tapId
con:parameter.con:description: id of tap

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: The date of the first day you want information from the beertap. The parameter is optional. If not not in use, the "from"-date will be set to the first day of the period. The format of a date: yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss.SSSZ Example: 2007-07-05T01:00:00.0Z

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: The date of the last day you want information from the beertap. The parameter is optional. If not in use, the "to"-date is set to the current day/last day of the period. Format of a date: yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss.SSSZ Example: 2007-07-05T06:00:00.0Z

con:parameter.con:name: sum
con:parameter.con:description: If true, returns the number of consumed beers between the from and to date. If false, returns the number of consumed beers from each beertap from every day between the from and to date.

con:method.name: postBeerTapData
con:method.con:description: Post beer tap data from a location. Secured, only for sensors

con:resource.name: userreports
con:resource.con:description: Get userreports from a spesific location. URL examples: http://findmyapp.net/findmyapp/locations/1/userreports?parname=fun_factor&from=2011-08-19T00:00:00.00Z, http://findmyapp.net/findmyapp/locations/1/userreports?parname=fun_factor

con:method.name: getReports
con:method.con:description: Get userreports from a location

con:parameter.con:name: action
con:parameter.con:description: if action=average is set, the average of the data wil be returned

con:parameter.con:name: noe
con:parameter.con:description: This is a filter option. It lets you pick out the last numberOfelemetns theat were reported

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: This is a filter option. It allows you to pick out all reports after a given date. Dates are given in the following way: 2011-07-19T19:41:00.00Z

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: This is a filter option, it is used with from to cut off all results after the given date.

con:parameter.con:name: parname
con:parameter.con:description: Custom parameter name

con:method.name: postReports
con:method.con:description: Post userreports from a location, Report is posted in body

con:method.name: getFriendsAtLocation
con:method.con:description: Get all friends at this location, secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:method.name: getLocation
con:method.con:description: Get location with the given id

con:method.name: postSample
con:method.con:description: Register a location sample containing signals and location name. Secured, only for sensors

con:method.name: CountForAllLocations
con:method.con:description: Get the number of registered users at all locations

con:method.name: getScreen
con:method.con:description: Get text on bartenders

con:method.name: setScreen
con:method.con:description: Put text on bartender screens

con:parameter.con:name: text
con:parameter.con:description: Text to display on bartender screens

con:method.name: getCurrentLocation
con:method.con:description: Determine location based on WLAN signals received. use PUT users/me/location/{id} to register this position to your user. Returns 404 code if the position could not be determined.

con:method.name: getAllLocations
con:method.con:description: Get all locations

con:parameter.con:name: ukaYear
con:parameter.con:description: What instance of uka are you intrested in, example "Uka11"

con:method.name: getUkaEventsFromQuery
con:method.con:description: Get events with title matching query

con:parameter.con:name: eventName
con:parameter.con:description: String to match titles.

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: id of event.

con:method.name: getEventById
con:method.con:description: Get the event with given id

con:method.name: getUkaEventsInUkaYear
con:method.con:description: Get the events from uka

con:parameter.con:name: date
con:parameter.con:description: List events on given date. If date is specified then from and to will be ignored.

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Lists events after date in from, is ignored if date is set.

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Lists events starting before the date in to. Is ignored if date is set.

con:parameter.con:name: place
con:parameter.con:description: List events only on this place.

con:parameter.con:name: place
con:parameter.con:description: name of the place of interest.

con:resource.name: next
con:resource.con:description: Get the next event happening at this place

con:method.name: getNextEventAtPlace
con:method.con:description: Get the next event at specified place

con:method.name: getEventsAtPlaceToday
con:method.con:description: Get events happening at this place today

con:method.name: getEventsAtPlaceTomorrow
con:method.con:description: Get the events happening at this place tomorrow

con:method.name: getAllEventsAtPlace
con:method.con:description: Get all the events happening at this place

con:method.name: getAllPlaces
con:method.con:description: List all Places of uka

con:method.name: getInfoAboutUka
con:method.con:description: Get start and end date of specified UKA

con:method.name: getInfoAboutAllUkas
con:method.con:description: Gets start date, end date and name of all Ukas

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: Id of the user

con:method.name: getEvents
con:method.con:description: Get all events registered on this userId. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:resource.name: location
con:resource.con:description: Get a user at differents location

con:method.name: getLocationForUser
con:method.con:description: Get location of user (by userId)

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:method.name: postPrivacyMe
con:method.con:description: Post my privacy settings

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:method.name: getPrivacyMe
con:method.con:description: Get my privacy settings

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:method.name: putMyLocation
con:method.con:description: Regiseter that you are on specified location. Secured by OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: locationId
con:parameter.con:description: Id of location

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:method.name: PostMyEvent
con:method.con:description: Sets you as attending an event. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: eventId
con:parameter.con:description: Id of event

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:method.name: DeleteMyEvent
con:method.con:description: Set as not attending event. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: eventId
con:parameter.con:description: Id of event

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:method.name: getMyEvents
con:method.con:description: Get my events. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:resource.name: friends
con:resource.con:description: Get my friends. Secured with OAuth

con:method.name: getAllMyFriendsAtLocation
con:method.con:description: Get location of all facebookFriends. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:method.name: GetMyFriends
con:method.con:description: Get my Facebookfriends. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Token for findmyapp

con:resource.name: location
con:resource.con:description: Get all users at different locations

con:method.name: GetLocationForAllUsers
con:method.con:description: Get location of all users. Secured with Oauth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp Token

con:method.name: getFriendsAttendingEvent
con:method.con:description: Returns a list of the users facebook friends that are attending an event spcified by the event Id

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: The event id of the event of interest

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:method.name: addParameter
con:method.con:description: Add parameter

con:parameter.con:name: name
con:parameter.con:description: new parameter's name

con:parameter.con:name: developerId
con:parameter.con:description: Id of developer

con:method.name: removeParameter
con:method.con:description: Remove parameter

con:method.name: cleanParameter
con:method.con:description: Deletes parameters with the given name

con:method.name: getDeveloperInfo
con:method.con:description: Get deevloper information

con:parameter.con:name: developerId
con:parameter.con:description: id of developer

con:method.name: getPerameters
con:method.con:description: Get all custom parameters

con:parameter.con:name: ukaYear
con:parameter.con:description: What instance of uka, example: "uka11"

con:method.name: GetMyCashlessInfo
con:method.con:description: Get my cashless information, secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:parameter.con:name: date
con:parameter.con:description: What date to recieve information from. Will override from and to parameters. Format YYYY-MM-DD

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Only show information newer than this, Format YYYY-MM-DD

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Dont show information newer than this. Format YYYY-MM-DD

con:parameter.con:name: orderBy
con:parameter.con:description: Currently not in use

con:method.name: GetLocationsCashless
con:method.con:description: Get locations registered in cashless

con:parameter.con:name: userId
con:parameter.con:description: Id of user

con:method.name: getCashlessInfo
con:method.con:description: Get cashless info from specified user. Currently not in use

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:parameter.con:name: date
con:parameter.con:description: What date to recieve information from. Will override from and to parameters. Format YYYY-MM-DD

con:parameter.con:name: from
con:parameter.con:description: Only show information newer than this, Format YYYY-MM-DD

con:parameter.con:name: to
con:parameter.con:description: Dont show information newer than this. Format YYYY-MM-DD

con:parameter.con:name: orderBy
con:parameter.con:description: Currently not in use

con:method.name: GetCashlessFriends
con:method.con:description: Get all friends using cashless. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:method.name: updateCashlessCardForUser
con:method.con:description: Register cashlesscard to user. Secured with OAuth

con:parameter.con:name: cardNo
con:parameter.con:description: Cashless card number

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:parameter.con:name: locationId
con:parameter.con:description: Id of a location where you can vote for music

con:parameter.con:name: spotifyId
con:parameter.con:description: Spotify's id of the song, should start with (urlencoded) spotify:track:

con:method.name: setSongAsPlaying
con:method.con:description: Set the given song as playing. Votes for this song will be reset, and the last time the song was played will be updated. Secured only for admins

con:method.name: getSongInfo
con:method.con:description: Get our information about the given song

con:method.name: requestSong
con:method.con:description: Vote for the given song to be played. Secured with OAuth.

con:parameter.con:name: code
con:parameter.con:description: A code to restrict the number of votes a person can make. Can only be used once

con:parameter.con:name: token
con:parameter.con:description: Findmyapp token

con:method.name: searchForSongs
con:method.con:description: Search for songs. This will show the same songs as when you search using the spotify id. In addition it will show our voting information

con:parameter.con:name: trackTitle
con:parameter.con:description: The query the search will try to match songs with

con:parameter.con:name: orderBy
con:parameter.con:description: Decides what order the results should be shown in

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Decides what page with results to show (same usage as in spotify's search api)

con:method.name: GetSongsRanked
con:method.con:description: Lists the most voted songs

con:parameter.con:name: fromIndex
con:parameter.con:description: Do not list the n first songs

con:parameter.con:name: num
con:parameter.con:description: List the given number of songs

con:parameter.con:name: notPlayedIn
con:parameter.con:description: Do not show songs played in the last n milliseconds

con:parameter.con:name: orderBy
con:parameter.con:description: Parameter specifying the order songs should be listed

con:method.name: deleteAllRequestsAtLocation
con:method.con:description: resets all requests for songs at this location. Secured, only for admins

con:method.name: getMusicSession
con:method.con:description: Get information about the music session with the given id

con:method.name: getAllMusicSessions
con:method.con:description: Get a list of all sessions

con:method.name: createOrUpdateMusicSessions
con:method.con:description: Creates a new, or updates an older music session

con:parameter.con:name: open
con:parameter.con:description: Set if this location is open for songvoting

con:parameter.con:name: sessionName
con:parameter.con:description: Set the name of the music session. Required when creating a new session

con:parameter.con:name: resetVotes
con:parameter.con:description: If true, then all votes at this location will be reset.

con:testCase.name: ping TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [echo] located at [/echo]

con:testCase.name: locations TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [position] located at [/position]

con:testStep.name: Get number of beers in period

con:restRequest.name: Get number of beers in period

con:restRequest.name: Get events from and to date

con:testStep.name: get featured (app of the day) android app

con:restRequest.name: get featured (app of the day) android app

con:testStep.name: get featured (app of the day) iPhone app

con:restRequest.name: get featured (app of the day) iPhone app

con:testStep.name: Get userreports from and to date

con:restRequest.name: Get userreports from and to date

con:testStep.name: Get userreports for parname and noe
